title: Estimate the center of mass position

content.description: A 5-kilogram sphere is connected to a 10-kilogram sphere by a rigid rod of negligible mass, as shown above.
content.question: Which of the five lettered points represents the center of mass of the sphere-rod combination?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
